Name 2014 UMD UMD Univ Maryland Distinguished University Professor 2007 UMD UMD CMPS Board of Visitors Distinguished Faculty Award 2006 Fellow ACM ACM FellowFor mentoring activities and contributions to numerical algorithms. 2005 Degree Honorary DegreeDoctor of Mathematics Honoris Causa, University of Waterloo, Canada. 1993 Award Distinguished AlumnaPurdue University Mentions 2014 UMD and NIST Announce the Creation of the Joint Center for Quantum Information and Computer Science Bonnie Dorr named Professor Emerita, and Dianne O'Leary named Distinguished University Professor Emerita 2013 Dianne O'Leary Gives Two Plenary Talks 2011 SIAM Student Paper: Sungwoo Park Dianne O'Leary: 2011 Norbert Wiener Lecturer 2010 2010 Spring Colloquium: Dianne O'Leary 2009 CS Professors selected as SIAM Fellows 2008 Dianne O'Leary receives multiple honors from AWM and SIAM 2007 Dianne O'Leary was chosen as the winner of the College's annual Board of Visitor's award for 2007 2006 Dianne O'Leary was named a Distinguished Scientist of the ACM. 1 2 next › last » Browse All News >>
